Definition.WordDefinition:
Grill \Grill\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Grilled}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Grilling}.] [F. griller, fr. gril gridiron, OF. gra["i]l, L. craticulum for craticula fine hurdlework, a small gridiron, dim. of crates hurdle. See {Grate}, n.] [1913 Webster] 1. To broil on a grill or gridiron. [1913 Webster]
Boiling of men in caldrons, grilling them on gridirons. --Marvell.
2. To torment, as if by broiling. --Dickens. [1913 Webster]
3. To stamp or mark with a grill. [Webster 1913 Suppl.]
grilling n : cooking by direct exposure to radiant heat (as over a fire or under a grill) [syn: {broil}, {broiling}]
